Subject: The uploading on the websites are not blocked
Description: The client has requested that the user should be able to access and browse the website, but file uploads must be restricted/blocked.
What_We_Know__c:
23.04.2025:
* The steps to reproduce the issue the partner wrote: 
"If we remove the website from the Denylist the website will open and user can upload."

* The partner / customer have not tried any troubleshooting steps.
* There are the domains added to the Deep Packet Inspection Allowed list.
Next_Steps__c:
23.04.2025:
We have a remote session scheduled for 24.04.2025 where we will conduct further investigations in customer environment.

07.05.2025:
Customer confirmed that everything is working fine and asked case to be closed.  The solution was to remove URL categories from the CAP policy, we did that in our remote session.
Solution_Comment__c:
07.05.2025:
Customer confirmed that everything is working fine and asked case to be closed.  The solution was to remove URL categories from the CAP policy, we did that in our remote session.
